page.title: 12MR PALIN THE CARPENTER.
page.content: WHAT HOURS A DAY DO YOU WORK?{6 {HOURS. WHAT SORT OF THINGS DO YOU MAKE? {CHAIRS TABLES STOOLS. DO YOU LIKE LIVING IN THE VILLAGE? {YES. HOW LONG HAVE YOU LIVED IN THE VILLAGE FOR?{1 YEAR. DO YOU LIKE THE CRAFT YOU DO?{YES. HOW MUCH MACHINERY DO YOU{HAVE?3 {THINGS. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE ENOUGH MACHINERY?{YES. WHAT SORT OF MACHINERY DO YOU HAVE? {CIRCULAR SAW AND A BAND SAW. WHICH IS THE HARDEST THING YOU HAVE HAD TO MAKE?{A CHURCH SCREEN. WHICH HAND TOOLS DO YOU USE THE MOST?{HAMMER SAW AND CHISEL {SCREWDRIVER. DO YOU START FROM A STRAIGHT PIECE OF WOOD?{YES.
